definition: a material effigy that is worshipped
details:
noun
- a material effigy that is worshipped
= synonyms: idol
- any supernatural being worshipped as controlling some part of the world or some aspect of life or who is the personification of a force
= synonyms: immortal
- a person of such superior qualities that they seem like a deity to other people
= example: a person of such superior qualities that they seem like a deity to other people
